meanings.definition: The line where the gums meet the teeth.
meanings.sent1: I brush along my gumlines to keep them healthy.
meanings.sent2: The dentist checked my gumlines for any signs of inflammation.
meanings.sent3: The gumlines looked like a tiny fence between the teeth.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a row of perfectly aligned gumlines.
meanings.sent5: The redness along the gumlines indicated possible gum disease.

meanings.sent1: The dentist explained that the gumlines protect the teeth.
meanings.sent2: Healthy gumlines are essential for overall oral health.
meanings.sent3: The gumlines seemed to be smiling back at me.
meanings.sent4: Her delicate gumlines resembled a soft pink ribbon.
meanings.sent5: I could see a slight recession in the gumlines near the molars.

meanings.sent1: She carefully gumlines the dental chart during the examination.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to gumlines the outline of the portrait.
meanings.sent3: He playfully gumlines his initials on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: The chef will gumlines the cake before decorating it.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to gumlines the important dates in their notebooks.
